cookingTips: Snap off the woody bottom of each asparagus spear by bending gently—it will break at the natural tender point
Steam for 4-6 minutes until tender-crisp, being careful not to overcook as it becomes mushy
Toss with butter immediately after steaming while still hot for even coating
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Steaming is a simple cooking method—how does it affect the flavor and texture of asparagus compared to roasting or sautéing?
